ProteinName	Myosin light chain 1/3, skeletal muscle isoform (MLC1/MLC3) (MLC1F/MLC3F) (Myosin light chain alkali 1/2) (Myosin light chain A1/A2)
GeneName	MYL1
Length	194
Function	Non-regulatory myosin light chain required for proper formation and/or maintenance of myofibers, and thus appropriate muscle function.
